AC Milan are facing a very tough challenge within squad selection as there are many absences which are Rade Krunic, Ante Rebic, Theo Hernàndez, Hakan Calhanoglu, Ismael Bennacer, and Matteo Gabbia while it remains to be seen if Alexis Saelemaekers will be ready for the trip to Cagliari or not.

According to the latest information from Milannews.it, coach Stefano Pioli will bring several players from the Rossoneri Primavera to the bench, including Enrico Di Gesù (18 year-old Italian midfielder) Nikolaos Michelis (19 year-old Greek centre-back who can also play as a central midfielder) and Emil Roback (Swedish 17 year-old striker)

The managerial stuff of the squad does not have exactly a wide variety of choices, therefore it is not surprising that some Primavera players are called up to reinforce the senior team in view of the game against Cagliari.

AC Milan are interested in Real Madrid’s versatile player Lucas Vázquez, whose contract expires next summer, while his negotiations with the Merengue for a contract renewal are currently stalling.

Therefore, according to Fichajes.com, the Rossoneri are closely following the situation to figure out what it could come up with, since they are more than ready to welcome him in Italy.

For the record, the former Espanyol player is considered as one of the most trusted players by Zinedine Zidane, as he is always performing at a high level no matter which position the French coach puts him.

Milan aren’t just focused on the January transfer window, having already secured three players, but also the future. Their strategy relies heavily on good opportunities and it seems a new one has emerged.

According to the journalist Bruno Andrade, who works for A Bola, Milan have set their sights on Porto midfielder Otavio. His contract will expire in the summer and the Rossoneri have already tabled a contract offer for him.


It would be a four-year deal worth €1.5m per year, which is tempting for the 25-year-old who plays in an attacking role. Porto are aware of Milan’s offer and are still trying to keep the Brazilian international, although that seems unlikely.

There haven’t been any confirmations in Italian media on the Rossoneri’s interest, but it certainly wouldn’t be a surprise if the rumours are true. Otavio has scored two goals and assisted an additional four in ten league games this season.

Zlatan Ibrahimović for Sky Sport:
About the match:
I wanted to score one more goal. However, two goals were enough to win. It was a difficult game. I haven't played in 57 days and I'm sorry for that. I am trying to slowly return to the proper disposition.
About young players:
Young players motivate me to act and challenge me. I don't give up and show them that I can run as much as they can.
About the present moment:
We are doing well and we are almost halfway through the competition. Now we are facing the most difficult matches.
Will anyone besides Mandzukić and Meite join the team?
I do not know. The more players we have at our disposal, the easier it will be for us to achieve our goals.
About Mandzukić:
Now we will have two strikers that our opponents will fear.
Do you believe in Scudetto?
I believe in Zlatan.
About the new contract:
It depends on Paolo. I am very happy in Milan. The return to Milan influenced me very well and I am very happy to be here.

https://sports.now.com/home/news/details?id=32091793808
【Now Sports】意甲豪門國際米蘭計劃於113周年更改球會標誌，並打算改更會方名字。
據意大利《米蘭體育報》報道，意甲球隊國際米蘭有意於今年3月9日，即球會113年周年時更改名字，由「FC Internazionale Milano」改為「Inter Milano」。球會希望通改簡單的名字，在不影響球迷如何稱呼國米而又意思相同下，將國米這個品牌重新定位，打入全球市場。

此外，會方的標誌亦會改變，將以「I」和「M」兩個英文字母為主。除此之外，球會的主要贊助商亦會由意大利輪胎公司倍耐力轉為中國恒大，而聖西路主場將會被拆卸，球隊移到一個全新的主場。

據知，會方一早已打算進行大改革。另外，由於現時全球因新型冠狀病毒流行重挫經濟，球會主席張康陽亦有意賣盤，將資源投放在其他業務上。
